title: Having lag in new client..
body:
Hello guys, my name is Codrin and since the new patch has appeared, I have some problems with the FPS in the game. Before the update , i had like 200 FPS (
> with 40 ms I don't know if this matters) .
My pc specs are : 
_i3 3.4 ghz
8gb of hyperX ram
video card AMD 7950 Series
mother board P85-D3_

Also a 64bit computer with windows 8.1 (unactivated)
Now, after the update , I  have like 60 fps with the exactly same options like before, and I don't know why this is happening.
Like, is not constantly 60fps, it drops down to max 45 for 2-3 seconds then came back, and I also have lag in the teamfight, that also been not so cool.

My pc runs games like GTA V or things like that like a pro, I have to mention that I don't have any special cooler for my CPU, is just the one from Intel.
What do you think I need to make ? I m really dumb.. I mean I don't know guys please **HELP ME**

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we only support **genuine** copies of Windows, as stated in our [**system requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/#wq1). You'll have to activate Windows and run all available Windows updates before I can assist you with troubleshooting this issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
